I would change my height to 6 feet tall. I have always felt that being taller would make me more confident and commanding, and it would also help me reach higher shelves and windows.
I would change the color of my hair to a vibrant shade of red. I have always admired people with red hair and I think it would be a fun and bold change to my appearance.
I would change the shape of my nose to a more defined and pointed shape. I think a more defined nose would make my face more symmetrical and aesthetically pleasing.
I would change the texture of my skin to be smoother and more even. I have always struggled with acne and uneven skin tone, and I think smoother skin would make me feel more confident and attractive.
I would change the size of my lips to be fuller and more defined. I think fuller lips would make me look more youthful and attractive, and it would also make me feel more confident in my appearance.
